Standard Blog Post With Image

2 Comments I January 27, 2015 I by Jhone Deo

Almost before we knew it we had left the ground.The face of the moon was in shadow.The spectacle before us was the indeed sublime.All their equipment and instruments are alive.All their equipment and instruments are alive.that watched the storm so beautiful yet terrific.Silver mist suffused the deck of the ship.The recorded voice scratched in the speaker.Almost before we knew it, we had left the ground.

The face of the moon was in shadow.Waves flung themselves at the blue evening.A red flair silhouetted the jagged edge of a wing.I watched the storm, so beautiful yet terrific.The spectacle before us was indeed about us services sublime.Then came the night of the first falling star.
